name: smart-trip-ai
description: Real-Time Tourist Crowd Predictor + Smart Itinerary Replanner

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ml-models && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ml" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ML-MODEL" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ml" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ML-MODEL" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold"
